title: Hour 3 - Adam Sandler
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Adam Sandler
description:
Dan discusses the latest in the NBA Finals and gives his thoughts on Draymond Green. Author Alan Shipnuck joins Dan to explain why he was removed from Phil Mickelson's press conference at the LIV Golf Tour. Adam Sandler joins the show to talk about his new film "Hustle" and give insight on what it was like to work with current NBA players.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
